content:
I wonder how you do search on meta.versionId (RE: If-Match for DELETE).
There is nothing about it in 2.26.4 Search Parameters.

To me the notation DELETE <base>/Patient/123/_history/xyz seems logical (but currently nog specified). This would not require the use of a _version searchparameter. (Although Vonk does allow you to search by version).

The meaning of Delete is very local policy specific. Some forms of delete will erase all versions, some will just mark the status of the Resource, others might delete and leave behind a Provenance of that delete action. So the answer on searching for deleted resources is use-case specific and policy specific.
